ComicInfo.Summary:
"Trial of Krang," part 2 of 3. The trial begins, and the surviving witnesses are strange and unusual, featuring old friends and uncertain allies. Krang has more tricks up his sleeve though, and the Malignoid swarm threatens to devour all of Dimension X!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Cory Smith (a) & Ronda Pattison (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Kevin Eastman (a) & Tomi Varga (c) | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Donny Tran (a) & Ronda Pattison (c) | 3 | RE | Planet Awesome Collectibles Exclusive Variant Cover | Marat Mychaels | 4 | RE | Yesteryear Comics Exclusive Variant Cover | Photo | 5 |
